titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Oakland County Pioneer and Historical Society histories

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: Oakland County Pioneer and Historical Society

did.unittitle: Oakland County Pioneer and Historical Society histories

archdesc.scopecontent: Historical sketches written as part of a project of the Oakland County, Michigan, Pioneer and Historical Society to compile the history of early Oakland County schools.
